actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize a demonstration program for the purpose of eliminating rail-highway crossings in the city of Orange, Tex.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a demonstration project in the city of Orange, Texas, for the relocation of the major railroad through line in such city for the purpose of eliminating rail-highway crossings. Authorizes appropriations not to exceed $15,000,000 to carry out such program.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a demonstration program for the purpose of eliminating rail-highway crossings in the city of Orange, Tex.
